did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Peter M. Strang Collection of Textile Industry Photographs, 1927
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Photographs included depict : picker rooms, a modern one-process picker, finish pickers in an old picker room, overhead cleaners and duct humidification, modern spinning rooms with individual motors, spinning room with 4- frame motor drive, typical spinning room shaft alley (belt alley).

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Pettee Machine Works (Newton Upper Falls, Mass.)

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Peter M. Strang Collection of Textile Industry Photographs #6833 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Item 1: Finisher Pickers in Picker Room

scopecontent.p: Interior view - Kitson Machine Co., Decatur, AL, mill
Interior view, Passaic Cotton Mills, Passaic, NJ
Interior view of one-process Whitin picker machine.

did.unittitle: Item 4: Shaft alley (belt alley) in spinning room, unidentified mill

scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, [?; original 1920-25]. Probably a copy print. Image depicts the interior of a spinning room in an unidentified mill, showing the shaft or belt alley where the belts run from each spinning frame up to the ceiling. Spinning frames made by Pettee Machine Works. Written on reverse: "Typical Spinning Room Shaft Alley (belt alley) in the Early 1920s." 20.5 x 25.5 cm.

did.unittitle: Item 5: Spinning room with 4-frame motor drive, unidentified mill

scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print, [?; original 1920-25]. Probably a copy print. Image depicts the Interior of a spinning room in an unidentified mill, showing cotton spinning frames made by Whitin Machine Works. Room is very large. Written on reverse: "Spinning Room with 4-Frame Motor Drive." 25.5 x 20.75 cm.

did.unittitle: Item 6: Modern spinning room, unidentified mill

scopecontent.p: Coxe Studio, High Grade Photography, Greenville, S.C., photographer. Gelatin silver print, [?; original 194-?]. Probably a copy print. Image depicts the interior of a spinning room in an unidentified mill, showing cotton spinning frames made by Whitin Machine Works. Written on reverse: "Modern Spinning Room with Individual Motors, Overhead Cleaners, and Duct Humidification." 25.5 x 20.5 cm.
